en.name: Andre Dantas
en.about_me_description:
My name is Andre Dantas and I'm a Software Developer living in Montreal, Canada.

Lover of new technologies, programming became to me the outlet to exploring visual and interactive experiences. Through this medium I feel highly motivated and eager to learn new skills every day.

I'm used to working in different environments, from small studios to big companies, and I love tackling new challenges, no matter their size.
